item.title: Dumping old Olivetti M20 Floppy Disks
item.description: The Olivetti L1 M20 Olivetti L1 M20 Back in the 1980’s my uncle owned a company for photo lithography. Eventually they needed a computer for adminstrative tasks and got a rather exotic Olivetti L1 M20. For the curious, the M20 has the following specs: Zilog Z8001 16 Bit CPU 128kb to 512kb RAM PCOS Operating System Built 1982-1984 512x256 Graphics, 4 or 8 colors, depending on the available memory board in use.
